arts.ttl: Cesc Fabregas: ‘We’re too nice, we need to commit more fouls’
arts.sum: Following the Lombardy Derby between Como and Monza, which ended in a 1-1 draw, Como’s head coach Cesc Fabregas shared his thoughts on the match and the team’s performance. The game, part of the 14th round of Serie A, showcased the struggles both teams face as they fight to avoid relegation. Fabregas began by discussing the challenges his team encountered during the match. “Today we didn’t have much depth on the bench. We are in a bit of a difficult moment with injuries,” he noted.
